text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
East Carolina Pirates Men's Executive Watch

Item specifications:
Links Make Watch Adjustable
Stainless Steel
Men
23kt Gold-Plated Bezel
Officially Licensed East Carolina Pirates Men's Two Tone Gold Dress Watch
text.Response A: ECU East Carolina men's two tone gold dress watch. College s executive timepiece offers men a classic, business-appropriate look. Features a 23kt gold-plated bezel, stainless steel case and date function. Secures to your wrist with a two-tone solid stainless steel band complete with safety clasp. Look good, while supporting your favorite team. Perfect for work, the game, a party, or any formal event. Water resistant up to 3 ATM.
text.Response B: The East Carolina Pirates Men's Executive Watch is a stylish timepiece for the distinguished Pirate fan. With a 23kt gold-plated bezel and two-tone stainless steel bracelet, this classy watch is perfect for any occasion. Plus, it's loaded with features like date, day and 24-hour subdials, and is water resistant to 5 ATM, so you can wear it with confidence wherever you go. Show your Pirate pride with this handsome watch, and cheer on the team in style!

499.displayed_text:
Prompt

Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
East Carolina Pirates Men's Executive Watch

Item specifications:
Links Make Watch Adjustable
Stainless Steel
Men
23kt Gold-Plated Bezel
Officially Licensed East Carolina Pirates Men's Two Tone Gold Dress Watch

Response A

ECU East Carolina men's two tone gold dress watch. College s executive timepiece offers men a classic, business-appropriate look. Features a 23kt gold-plated bezel, stainless steel case and date function. Secures to your wrist with a two-tone solid stainless steel band complete with safety clasp. Look good, while supporting your favorite team. Perfect for work, the game, a party, or any formal event. Water resistant up to 3 ATM.

Response B

The East Carolina Pirates Men's Executive Watch is a stylish timepiece for the distinguished Pirate fan. With a 23kt gold-plated bezel and two-tone stainless steel bracelet, this classy watch is perfect for any occasion. Plus, it's loaded with features like date, day and 24-hour subdials, and is water resistant to 5 ATM, so you can wear it with confidence wherever you go. Show your Pirate pride with this handsome watch, and cheer on the team in style!
